alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 21 at 7:54PM MDT until May 22 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be strongest below Tijeras Canyon in eastern Albuquerque. Blowing dust is likely, with visibility plummeting below 1 mile at times in dust-prone locations.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous cross winds can be expected, especially for motorists on north-to-south oriented roads like I-25.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area
